_comment: Maps benchmark codes to user escalation prompts

A-NEG1.rationale: Simple negation misinterpretation requires user clarification of present/absent

A-NEG2.rationale: Complex negation also uses negation clarification prompt

A-FCT1.rationale: Vital sign extraction errors may involve unit confusion

A-FCT4.rationale: Impression mismatch may involve laterality or source conflicts

A-TMP2.rationale: Event sequence errors require timeline verification

A-TMP3.rationale: Protocol step misordering requires sequence clarification

A-CMP1.rationale: Dispatch section gaps may involve incomplete medication info

A-CMP5.rationale: Treatment section gaps involve medication or vitals documentation

A-SFT1.rationale: Unsafe dose detection may require dose/route clarification

A-SFT2.rationale: Contraindication detection may require medication clarification

A-SFT4.rationale: Missing repeat vitals requires vitals clarification

A-CAR1.rationale: ROSC/termination documentation requires arrest sequence verification

A-CAR2.rationale: CPR details require arrest sequence verification

A-STR2.rationale: Last known well requires precise time clarification

A-REF1.rationale: Refusal documentation may conflict with transport disposition

A-PED1.rationale: Pediatric dosing errors require weight-based dose clarification

A-UNC1.rationale: Hallucination requires agent re-extraction, not user prompt

A-UNC2.rationale: Silent omission may require data gap clarification

A-EVD1.rationale: Missing evidence span may require source clarification

A-FMT1.rationale: JSON structure errors are mechanical, no user prompt needed
